website_summaries.verdict: A lot of features for the price on this two-camera rearview dash screen model.
pros: Includes both a front and back camera and a touch screen function
An automatic sensor records when a collision is imminent
Mirror looks more like a regular mirror than others
Quality of the manufacturing is high for the price
Good customer service from the company if you run into problems
cons: Rear camera is not as strong as other models
Mirror function can seem a little dark

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This was originally a one-star review. I liked the product just fine, but it only lasted a couple of weeks past the warranty before it suddenly stopped working. AKASO saw my review and reached out with an offer to replace it. So far, so good! Sometimes things go wrong, but I do have to give the company credit for doing right by me. I'd buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Phrits

customer_reviews.title: Quick install... clear picture.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install.... great picture... auto record mode and motion recording is smooth. night mode is good... One tip.. format your sd card via the unit in settings not on your computer.
customer_reviews.author: heath bodo

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first. Now has frequent intermittent problems.
customer_reviews.text: Installation took a while, mostly routing wires, especially out the back of my pickup cab and through to the tailgate. One downside is it doesn’t come with a complete user manual that describes the features and software setup. Worked fairly well for a while but after a while the battery doesn’t always keep its charge even though I drive for hours and the video monitor will switch on intermittently while driving. Also the backing camera won’t always turn on. It seems the software freezes as I’ll press buttons to try to wake the screen to see the rear view but it won’t respond to input, just stays blank. Tried to reset it multiple times with no change.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very nice feel to the mirror and it was easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice feel to the mirror and it was easy to install ( does take sometime to hide all the wiring if you want a cleaner look). Feels very secure on my 2015 ford fiesta. Forward camera has a good quality hd image, and an acceptable amount of features. Rear camera is ok at best, and has almost no visibility at night, but it is some what useful during the day. Over all I'm really enjoying the camera.
customer_reviews.author: kphoto

customer_reviews.title: The accident wasn’t recorded
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a new driver. And I bought this dash cam to record my her‘s driving. I didn’t want to play with installation and hired a certified mechanic to do it right. It worked in the beginning and I used those videos to show my daughter her progress after driving lessons. Wenn an accident happened I found out that the camera started to record only first 3 min in the beginning of each ride and stoped after. The accident was in the fifth minute and it wasn’t recorded. Who needs the dash cam without proper recordings...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first two months. After that, the camera started glitching, turned on and off whenever it wanted to, even though it was plugged in it didn’t charge so I had to keep wiggling it does not stay charged, only works if plugged in. Within the five months I had this camera it has drained my car battery and also it cause my outlet in my car to break. Last night, the whole entire part where you plug in broke (see picture) into pieces while inside the outlet. Now, my outlet doesn’t even work to charge my phone! DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia D

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, far above my expectations. I did not expect so many features for the price. Good video quality and software. The only disappointment is the quality of video on the back camera at night. I really can't use it as a bank up camera in the dark because of the grainy picture quality. The mounting options for the back camera is also limited. The should be an option to clamp it to the edge of the tailgate or trunk instead of having to drill through paint.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Fong

customer_reviews.title: Got this on February 17 2018 Work good for awhile now freezing up
customer_reviews.text: Got this on February 17 2018 Work good for awhile now freezing up. Unplug until battery dies. Then works good for 1 or 2 times then freezes up again. Can't use any buttons or touch screen. Screen stays on until battery dies. Worked for 3 months. Like it otherwise. Haven't tried get it replaced yet. Lot of money for something that starts messing up in just 3 months. Now deal with getting my money back or just trash it.
customer_reviews.author: deborah cates

customer_reviews.title: Great For A Few Weeks, Then the Battery Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked great for a few weeks until the warranty expired. Now the battery won't hold a charge so the camera turns off and on all the time. I paid $100 to have the camera pro installed and now I am not sure what to do. I have not contacted the company yet, but it will cost me money twice (to pay to have the cables taken out and then reinstalled) if I have to send the cables back to replace the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Toad

customer_reviews.title: Very unreliable!
customer_reviews.text: I hAve had to order 2 units. The first unit had cracked display. The second unit failed. The screen display is just a gray screen
customer_reviews.author: Ray D. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Need to drill holes for back camera
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this dash camera. Great product. Need to drill holes for back camera. It is really fun weekend DIY project. After install the back camera , it will record with front and rear at the same time , wow. Both captured pics and videos are critical clear Definitely worth to buy !!! Pictures worth a thousand words.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Well, Unfortunately I did not install this on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, Unfortunately I did not install this on my Dads truck until after 3 months of receiving it, so I can't return it. It does not go into options or settings. I cannot set anything on it. It does record front and back. But I cannot set time or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Prime

customer_reviews.title: Great Device if didnt have so many issues
customer_reviews.text: i purchased 2 of these dash cams and at first was very excited , my 1st cams , but as little a 2 weeks started having major issues with both cams and having to contact amazon support was very time consuming , not happy with the experience the charger port was defecting in less the a month and the software glitches out all the time i would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year buying this product, it keeps going on and off even after changing the cable lines. In addition, the parking mode doesn't seem to work when the power is off so it doesn't record at all if it does detect motion. However, the camera quality was nice at the front. The rear camera is more muggy though so it might be better putting it where you can't see the window grid lines.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but too wide for a back up camera.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an oem like rear camera then this is probably not the one. Camera coverage is too wide that you need to toggle up/down when backing up. Red line still about .5 meters from the car. Tried different angles but if you point it down to see the edge of the car's back, coverage area will be too less. Like zoom function, closer but less coverage. Some recording also won't play. Image quality of both front and reverse camera is excellent though.
customer_reviews.author: Ion

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.  Glitching after few months of use, NO customer support
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this for me as a Christmas gift. I installed it some time in January. It worked great for a few months, then started glitching. The screen would randomly turn on and other times randomly restart. I sent two emails to Akaso, based on the customer support on their webpage (csx.tabletexpress@gmail.com), over the course of a week and did not receive a reply.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has not broken yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've read many reviews for these dash cam recorders and my pervading view was one of unreliability. So I was understandably apprehensive about buying this product for fear of it breaking within a few weeks (days even...) of installation. I'm happy to say that I've now been using it daily for 7 months with no issues to report of. Product came as advertised and recording quality is surprisingly good. Rear cam isn't the best but it's sufficient for parking. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase. (Will probably stop working now that I've posted this)
customer_reviews.author: Eye masked customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service!
customer_reviews.text: I receive not bad camera for that money and that price. It has normal recording but unfortunately not high quality. Easy installation! It's really work with back up camera, you can see everything clear. The lines helps a lot. Good service!!! The Seller gave us a great service. Our kit has not serious issues, but we was not satisfied with the purchase, so the seller propoused us to take money back or to try a new kit. We decide to give a second chance for the new kit. For today our new kit on a my way! Like I sad before you Didn't find much better for THAT MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: This camera super cool,I like it covers much wider angle compare with ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera super cool,I like it covers much wider angle compare with my regular mirror.Also takes accurate pictures and videos. The best feature that I found in this camera is that two video streams can be processed simultaneously.I love it a lot. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Shi

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, quite invisible from outside
customer_reviews.text: Great dashcam! Great picture quality, very easy to install and it works with 64gb SD card. Few improvements I would love to see is slightly more motion on the camera swivel so its easier to point where wanted since it depends on mirror angle. I would also offer 5 or 10-second preview as shortest instead of 30 seconds, USB cable instead of the hardwired charger and straight connector instead of the left angle so it goes directly toward headliner. PS: Several of my friends and colleagues really like the camera and are planning to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: CBPTLS

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 month. No longer powers on
customer_reviews.text: Update 9-4-17 Seller contacted me and offered a replacement.I found out there was something wrong with the power cable and it would blow out the fuse of any cigarette plugs I plug the cable in. I asked for a refund they were willing to do so. It was a good buy when it was working. I just happened to be one of the unlucky ones. ------------------- Front camera is clear. Rear camera isn't that great especially when it gets dark. It operated for about a month and now it no longer powers on. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ly M.

customer_reviews.title: Why this didn't have sitting for recording?
customer_reviews.text: I installed this drive came in the day time, This didn't have any helpful manual, the touch screen is pretty slow, As I test the motion detection it doesn't work all the time, and No Recording Sitting ( even when I had the car on is only recorded 08 seconds or 15 seconds) and when I am driving for 23 minutes there is Multiples recorded files, but is only recorded 15 second longest
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every is perfect, check out the YouTube installation video and don’t forget the SD card.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected and described. Check YouTube for installation video and don’t forget that you need a micro SD card for recording and photo functions. The max micro SD card size is 32GB and the recommended speed is 10. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: but the video quality is very good and clear
customer_reviews.text: just set up today. Although It took me some time to set up, but the video quality is very good and clear. Also, before I buy it, I was concern about whether it can fit my original mirror since my mirror is pretty thick. However, my concern is totally unnecessary. It just fit my mirror properly. I didn’t set up the rear cam, so I can’t tell if it is good or not. Beyond this, I am very happy about this product.
customer_reviews.author: lin xiao

customer_reviews.title: All the features are great, except it doesn't work stable
customer_reviews.text: All the features are great, except it doesn't work stable. It got froze just a week after I installed; I had to unplug the power cord and restart. Less than six months, it started to flicker when the car is backing up. Still can't figure out what cause it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mirror
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to connect no instructions very disappointing now i had to pay a professional out of pocket bcs this device came with no instructions to put together Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Mellowchica

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Feel so much more safe since it has been installed. Took my husband 30 min to install
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eichel

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, will not last
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked fine for about 2months, after that nothing. I unhooked the wire and just kept the mirror attached.have to find a better unit
customer_reviews.author: MBenz

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning after 3months
customer_reviews.text: This device stops working after 3 months. The customer service says I need to pay $20 for replacement. I am not happy with the rear view camera. Compared to my another dashcam from another vendor, the front camera quality is poor. So, no reason to spend another 20 dollar for poor quality product. Disassembled the cam and threw them into trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Yang

customer_reviews.title: Relax with Dash Cam and Backup Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas. He absolutely loves it, and he says it works great. He is always worried that someone or something will get behind him, while he is backing up. Having this, helps him to feel more at ease.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: only problem is the back camera is filming left to right right to left and low quality resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 2 1/2 months then started blowing the fuse in my Jeep
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 4 months. Worked great for the first 2 1/2 months, after that I plugged it in one day and it blew the fuse. Got the fuse replaced and tried different devices in the cigarette lighter with no issue. Plugged the camera in again and it blew the fuse again. Getting rid of it before it causes more damage to my fuse box.
customer_reviews.author: RCN

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first BUT
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first. Then 6 months into it, the recording would freeze. I’d have to unplug the mirror and wait till battery is depleted till I can apply power and reuse. Has happened multiple times. Would like to return
customer_reviews.author: TnL

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Was sent a replacement. Good picture quality and very touch responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heads up I see whose behind me now!
customer_reviews.text: Love how straight forward it is to install the screen hangs on over the vehicle's mirror and is super easy navigate and use the built in software.
customer_reviews.author: etwang80

customer_reviews.title: The2 cameras are great!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this unit works. The only problem I have is with the installation of the rear camera. There needs to be better instructions. I had to have it installed by a auto electrical technician. However, he did a good job and i’m very satisfied with how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Not happy,  due to short wires I now have exposed wires..  Looks horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but difficult to properly installed, very short rear camera power wires..
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Ilarraza

customer_reviews.title: when It’s your word against the other driver.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have used it for a while and it is very clear. This is worth every dollar. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Installation was pretty easy, and the manual is good to understand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product and installed in my car without any problems. Installation was pretty easy, and the manual is good to understand. I am very happy to buy the product. It satisfies me. You need to purchase a SD card to use the dash cam right away.
customer_reviews.author: GyungHyun R.

customer_reviews.title: very good product!
customer_reviews.text: - Very good, overall design, functionality and package - Rear camera power cable (connected to rear light) is short - will be good to be able to set default LCD configuration (front/rear camera setting) I wanted to set full LCD for rear camera but when it turns on, always picture in picture with small rear camera
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ho Sang

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great quality
customer_reviews.text: The mirror dash cam is easy to use and great picture quality. From time to time the came would randomly stop recording for some reason but other than that is a great dash cam mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: My friend bought a car, she is a new ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend bought a car, she is a new driver, she bought the product in the car with the recommendation of her friend, she can drive safely, and she can protect herself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product at a great cost
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints about this product. Love all the features.
customer_reviews.author: Panapower

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dash cam. It is very easy to install and pre-configured. As soon as I connect it and start the car, it turns on and begin to record. Very helpful to the first timers like me. The front cam’s picture quality is very clear. Surprisingly, the package comes with a rear view camera as well. Just like to remind that it doesn't come with SD card, which needs to buy separately. I recommended this dash cam to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: The camera is good for the price. Its easy to install and picture quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ria Ramchandani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one after small car accident to prevent the annoying situstion I experienced. It is easy to install and works well. I am happy with purchase and will buy another one for our another car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount and start using. Tucking all the wires is a tough job, but not terribly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product! good image quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product! good image quality, easy to set up, the best is it can be record video both front and rear! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: First time buying this and was amazed at quality of the video
customer_reviews.author: Long tran

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this being difficult to install with the wires and everything, but it was extremely easy. I was able to easily stuff any wired into the roofing and make it look presentable. The mirror is nice and long and the video looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says, great camera, hope I never need it for an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Great product experience
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my friend I bought this product as he loves it so much m. I never used such product before. So for I enjoy every minute driving with it. The features and user experiences are great, I will recommend to more friends.
customer_reviews.author: Qian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and has great picture! Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Benzc313

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I put this in both cars I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I put this in both cars I own with no problems. If you have a larger SUV and want to mount the rear camera by the license you will need to add the wire extension.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these, Installed the camera a month later the rear camera does not display any pictures and the front camera is distorted. Customer service reached out to me and sent me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Stuck unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Nov and By feb camera would stay on unresponsive...
customer_reviews.author: anthony l.

customer_reviews.title: recommended overall
customer_reviews.text: nice camera. fancy style. video quality is fairly good. the installation took a bit time because the manual does not tell much about that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon2016

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not charge
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May and due to medical issues I just installed it. The battery does not charge so it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: SM.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product has good quality. And it is the same as in the photos. Works perfectly as a mirror and a camera! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Now my dash cam is on and off. I do not know why
customer_reviews.author: Haner

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i want to return it and get a better one
customer_reviews.author: jerica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best mirror with dual camera... great product, easy to install and use..the quality is good
customer_reviews.author: Solidus

customer_reviews.title: This is very good!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Because its function is very large. Its front and rear camera are very clear. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: qi wang

customer_reviews.title: I think it could be very annoying to arrange a traffic accident with my clumsy english
customer_reviews.text: It is a must -have- item for those who are not fluent in english. Actually I came from South Korea. In Korea, we call this kind of stuff 'car black box'. Most Koreans have installed 'car black box' in their cars. But in America I could not find proper product. Whenever I drive, I feel scared for traffic accident. I think it could be very annoying to arrange a traffic accident with my clumsy english. Also It could be very difficult to get a proper eye witness for that accident. This dash cam is clear solution for this problem. I strongly recommend. Especially night time vision is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Denverkhai

customer_reviews.title: very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for a week already, this dash cam include rare-side, very easy to install, easy for us to know how to use the function. It is a great product, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yousha

customer_reviews.title: it will be better if it comes with the speed recording
customer_reviews.text: it has been using for a week. it's functional well as described. it will be better if it comes with the speed recording.
customer_reviews.author: ivyroot

customer_reviews.title: very cheap product
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality works on and off dont recommend buying
customer_reviews.author: Neil W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for such product for a long time and this one seems to provide all the functions that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s got a very clear camra, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Lichtenstadter

customer_reviews.title: It is a 1080p front camera and 480p rear camera ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a 1080p front camera and 480p rear camera, it's doesn't come with SD card, it doesn't come with USB cable as additional accessory is case there is a need to use it. In the long run the camera is $100+. Just bought one that's 1080p front and rear plus it already had SD card and few more accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Primemember83

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This a huge rearview mirror and camera love guy thanks
customer_reviews.author: josh Miller

customer_reviews.title: Software wise it is a typical chinese dashcam. Does ...
customer_reviews.text: Software wise it is a typical chinese dashcam. Does what it is supposed to, no outstanding features. Mounting solution works well too. HOWEVER! The screen area square is too distracting in the rearview mirror. Rear camera is absolutely useles with it's 640x480 image quality and narrow angle. I really do not understand why there is not option on the market for a high resolution wide angle cameras for front AND rear. Even at extra cost! ???
customer_reviews.author: Juliana M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! You get more what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Super clear camera. Works well at night time. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The dash cam is ok, but the front Charging Cable just stopped working in the firs day .....
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Loved this dash board camera. I was using my action camera for recording but now, this product is what I need for everyday. Features are beautiful including motion detector. When I looked back into the recording there were some 50 and 60 seconds video and was wondering why the duration was so less. So even in the parking lot, if someone is passing by, it records immediately. Installation was very easy and camera settings are also no brainer. I have taken some videos as well, which shows crystal clear image. All the signboards are clear enough to read.
customer_reviews.author: Vishesh Radiya

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Pros: 1.) The front camera is discreet, I almost forget that it’s there. It also has a very clear view of traffic flow + traffic lights. 2.) The rear camera is small and not very noticeable as well. 3.) the camera is pretty easy to navigate 4.) installing the product was easy (I’m not a tech savvy person, either) Cons: The rear camera is not AS clear, but it’ll do because it’s clear enough to see who is behind you. Overall this is an excellent product and worth the money. I spent days doing research on dash cameras and after reading the reviews I settled on this one. Great for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Penelopie

customer_reviews.title: Good cam for the price
customer_reviews.text: I always had the dash cam,,I had bought the z-edge,$149.00 one,it's ok,but for me it's just a little touchy,it keeps saving files when ya hit a little bump,or pot hole,and sometime just sitting at a light,and cain't shut the sound off,anyway,I thought I would try a mirror cam,I read the reviews on this one as well as others,and ya gotta find the one you want,so for now I love it,wasn't at all like I'd thought it would be,so for now,yep works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy! It is one product that has all three ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dash cam, a bigger rear view camera, and a rear view camera to help with parking. When I saw this product, I was very happy! It is one product that has all three things combined! I have been using it for more than one week now, and it is working as expected. The recorded image and video quality are very satisfiable. I personally installed the product myself. I found detailed instruction online and it is easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: GetToTryThings

customer_reviews.title: This dash cam worked great! Installation was pretty simple if you have common ...
customer_reviews.text: Update **** camera stop working after 7 months. Contact seller but haven't received any answers or feedback. This dash cam worked great! Installation was pretty simple if you have common sense. Quality is great for the money. Would recommend purchasing this cam if your car doesn't have one. Tip to install the back up camera, turn on your back up lights (reverse lights) and tapped into the power source and the dash cam would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera and records front and rear. Play back, touch screen and ease of installation are all great. The mirror itself is a little large for my Ford pickup rear view mirror. The night vision is good, but infra red is not bright enough. The image on the mirror during the day is not bright and I can hardly tell a difference in this and the night time setting.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work can't see out of the mirror clearly. SD card is inserted but it's not recording is family me card is not inserted unable to return at this point This is a problem of buying things with Amazon's they're realistic return policy is only 30 days when most places with stuff like this is a 90 day return. It sucks that I have to keep it and it's not working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my first dash cam and i highly recommend it to others
customer_reviews.text: This is my first dash cam and i highly recommend it to others.I was amazed with the compact size of this recorder for the amount of features it has. The actual mounting system is phenomenal with many different options for positioning the cam. The camera is also very versatile in terms of being able to be maneuvered in any position you see fit, while not hindering your line of sight behind the wheel. Such a great addition to any vehicle. Easy to install. The video resolution for this dash cam is really great - even at night! Incredibly easy to use and the display is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: F. Hsu

customer_reviews.title: This dash cam is suitable for my car. It ...
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is suitable for my car. It can start or stop recording automatically when the engine turn on or off. It coves the front and rear record. It is very convenient when you are driving. Only problem is that this cam doesn't come with the car camera sd card. I'm waiting the sd card that I buy from online now, then I will start to use it. This price is reasonable for this high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Yin

customer_reviews.title: simple to use and setup also excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Wish had it long time ago know for sure if the one in my truck are van go out will purchase more of this product . I am going use it in my motor home that I am remodeling love the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great When It Works, But Buggy and Drains Car Battery
customer_reviews.text: When everything is working correctly this is a nice little backup and dash cam combo. The software is kinda buggy and sometimes it turns on and off repeatedly while driving. The worst part though is that it drains my car battery to the point I need to jump my car if I don't drive it for a day or two. The settings are not very intuitive unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Daft Hunk

customer_reviews.title: Great dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this unit. After trying many dashcam this has been my go-to. Long cords accommodate any vehicle and I love having front and back cams.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation. High quality. Rear camera cable might be too short
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Took me less than 40min to wire everything under the trim and set it up. Good performance and high quality. No lane assist system though. Works fine and I am happy for what I got for this price! The rear view camera couldn't be installed on the liscenseplate of my camry, cause cable was too short...(has to clear the liftgate movement) but on the bumper worked fine. But it's super exposed now.
customer_reviews.author: Markus

customer_reviews.title: Good cam
customer_reviews.text: Front camera is good and the back camera is alright (changed to two stars because the battery doesnt last for long at all after charging it all day it dies after like 30 seconds..)
customer_reviews.author: Fazzix

customer_reviews.title: It's an AMAZING dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a Thanks Giving gift for wife. Installed the front cam and got so impressed by its touch screen and quality HD video. Easy to install and setup, at least for the front cam, I'm not using the rear cam yet. It's a great buy and high quality product to recommend.
customer_reviews.author: wormsoldier

customer_reviews.title: A great dash cam
customer_reviews.text: I really like the AKASO dash cam. It's easy to install and easy to set up. The camera has all the features needed - front and back cameras, G-sensor, night vision, and parking monitor. The video quality is very good. Moreover, the mirror form of the camera is a excellent design - it does not take extra room and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Shu Q. Liu

customer_reviews.title: No bad for $$#
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can go wrong. The rear camera is fuzzy but works. The front mirror camera works well along with a nice wide view. So far so well. Let's see how long it last. All these products are made in China. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great item it works well in day and at night
customer_reviews.text: Great item it works well in day and at night, the image is super clear and the touch screen is easy to use. It took me a bit to run the rear camera wire so it did not show but once installed the system worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome! I drive a mini van and sometime it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I drive a mini van and sometime it’s hard for me to see my rear and blind spots. The camera makes everything so much easier. Super easy installation and it arrived very quickly. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Good Product For The Price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product for the price. Picture quality is good. License plates are difficult to read at times. If you have a truck, big SUV, or four-door sedan, you will need to purchase a 4-pin extension for the rear camera. The factory cord is not long enough if you wish to install by rear license plate.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to install and it works very well with my ...
customer_reviews.text: I am ver impressed with this Dash Cam. I have been using this for a few days now. It was very easy to install and it works very well with my car. I am now using this on scenic drives.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I could not drive without it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I had it install at the mechanic for $100 bucks. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Drin

customer_reviews.title: It's missing USB and some other critical pieces but it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's missing USB and some other critical pieces but it does work. You be the judge as to whether that warrants the price.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product awesome customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product works great with clear clarity, customer service truly cares about their product.
customer_reviews.author: Jcg

customer_reviews.title: 2in1 dash camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I got this for my hubby and he is very impressed with it !!! Installed it easily for setup&control and Very Important Don’t forget to purchase SD card
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Camera came quick. Quality is good, and there is a small screen on the left hand side that is a good size. The mirror is large enough that it will eclipse the mirror. It fit well on our Honda CRV. It does well with turning on and off with the car engine. It helps a lot to have something like this when parallel parking.
customer_reviews.author: S S

product_meta.title: AKASO Dash Cam with Backup Camera, 5" FHD 1080P Touchscreen Front and Rear Dual Dash Camera for Cars, Driving Loop Recorder Waterproof G-Sensor, Night Vision, Motion Detection Reversing Camera(DL2)
feature_bullets: 🎁【Must-have Car Camera】：With more Traffic accident happened, mirror dash cam has become a must-have accessory for commuters,road-trippers and ride-hailing drivers.Whether used to provide evidence to police or help you avoid paying for a crash-for-cash scheme,footage from dash cam provides irrefutable proof of fault in the event of accident.

🎁【WDR & Super Night Vision】：Glare light is a serious problem when driving. AKASO mirror camera with WDR function greatly balance the brightness for driving environment at night; Features with FHD 1920x1080P/ 30FPS, our touch screen dash cam with 170°wide-angel monitors and advanced sensors to capture clearer license plates and details displayed in 5.0 inch screen.

🎁【 IPS Touch Screen & Dual Camera 】：Streaming media mirror cam features 5" touch screen and AHD tech to display super crisp real-time traffic condition to you. Blue anti-glare film eliminates glare from night lights and provide clear view.1080P front camera and 480P rear camera helps you to reverse your car to avoid unexpected with guide lines.Also ,recording clear videos images to playback on mirror cam.

🎁【Powerful Functions & Safe for Driving】：Loop Recording allows rear view mirror dash cam to overwrite old files with new files. Once memory card’s space is full, car camera will delete first video file(except emergency files) to make space for latest one. Parking Monitor -If motion or a vibration is detected by the device, it will automatically turn on and begin recording.G-sensor and emergency lock on Rearview mirror camera to automatically lock the video when collision occurs.

🎁【What You Get】：User Manual/ Straps/ User Manual/ AKASO DL2 Mirror Dash Cam/ Rear Camera/ Rear Camera Extension Cable(19ft)/ front Charging Cable (12ft), Mic SD card NOT included, 32GB Samsung or SanDisk class 10 SD card recommended.Please Kindly Email us via email for any questions meet.
